mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.receipt_id AS "receipt.id", a.address_id AS "address.id", sa.address AS "address.address", sa.tel AS "address.tel", a.goods_id AS "goods.id", sg.name AS "goods.name", sg.image AS "goods.image", a.spec_ids AS "specIds", a.num AS "num", a.price AS "price", a.cost_price AS "costPrice", a.sort AS "sort", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", sm.name AS "createBy.name", sm.photo AS "createBy.photo", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.ddbs AS "ddbs", sg.name AS "sGoods.name", sg.image AS "sGoods.image", a.kddh AS "kddh", a.thkddh AS "thkddh"
LEFT JOIN s_goods sg ON sg.id=a.goods_id LEFT JOIN s_address sa ON sa.id=a.address_id LEFT JOIN s_member sm ON sm.id=a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_order( id, order_no, receipt_id, address_id, goods_id, spec_ids, num, price, cost_price, sort, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, ddbs, kddh, thkddh ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderNo}, #{receipt.id}, #{address.id}, #{goods.id}, #{specIds}, #{num}, #{price}, #{costPrice}, #{sort}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{ddbs}, #{kddh}, #{thkddh} )
mapper.update: UPDATE s_order SET order_no = #{orderNo}, receipt_id = #{receipt.id}, address_id = #{address.id}, goods_id = #{goods.id}, spec_ids = #{specIds}, num = #{num}, price = #{price}, cost_price = #{costPrice}, sort = #{sort}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, ddbs=#{ddbs}, kddh=#{kddh}, thkddh=#{thkddh} WHERE id = #{id}
